From: Gerwin Klein <kleing@unsw.edu.au>
Finite Map Extras
by Javier DÃ­az

This entry includes useful syntactic sugar, new operators and functions, and their associated lemmas for finite maps which currently are not present in the standard Finite_Map theory.

https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Finite-Map-Extras.html

Enjoy!
Gerwin
